title: 【大檸樂】初步研究指出武漢肺炎基本傳染數(R0)高過殺咗5千萬人嘅西班牙流感

replies.msg:
啱啱尋日出嘅研究報告，英美三間大學做

PDF Link： https://drive.google.com/file/d/1fz7EwlAJjrZs708YGPym1Xj_3PmysukL/view
Archive： https://archive.is/XCERo

主要總結：
We estimate the basic reproductive number of the infection (𝑅𝑅0) to be significantly greater than one. We estimate it to be between 3.6 and 4.0, indicating that 72-75% of transmissions must be prevented by control measures for infections to stop increasing. （成72-75%嘅傳播要有控制措施應變先可以防止感染率上升）

We estimate that only 5.1% (95%CI, 4.8–5.5) of infections in Wuhan are identified （只有5.1
%喺武漢嘅感染係確診咗）, indicating a large number of infections in the community, and also reflecting the difficulty in detecting cases of this new disease. Surveillance for this novel pathogen has been launched very quickly by public health authorities in China, allowing for rapid assessment of the speed of increase of cases in Wuhan and other areas.

If no change in control or transmission happens, then we expect further outbreaks to occur in other Chinese cities, and that infections will continue to be exported to international destinations at an increasing rate. In 14 days’ time (4 February 2020), our model predicts the number of infected people in Wuhan to be greater than 250 thousand (prediction interval, 164,602 to 351,396). （如果傳染繼續失控，14日內武漢會有25萬感染） We predict the cities with the largest outbreaks elsewhere in China to be Shanghai, Beijing, Guangzhou, Chongqing and Chengdu. We also predict that by 4 Feb 2020, the countries or special administrative regions at greatest risk of importing infections through air travel are Thailand, Japan, Taiwan, Hong Kong, and South Korea.

Our model suggests that travel restrictions from and to Wuhan city are unlikely to be effective in halting transmission across China （武漢封城根本無用）; with a 99% effective reduction in travel, the size of the epidemic outside of Wuhan may only be reduced by 24.9% on 4 February （就算99%封城，武漢外嘅瘟疫直至2月4號都只能夠減少24.9%）

（實際應該多幾倍）
都冇支爆
死夠5000萬人再話我知中共爆未

睇支那封咗十城就知有幾嚴重
我哋要行動了
我覺得起碼超過一百萬人受感染
多謝燒山
中共幾時可以講真話？俾實際數字出黎？
此回覆已被刪除
各國仲唔封關封港口就贏
越來越似未日喪屍片

pinned.msg:
睇咗佢入面D assumption, 睇完我覺得係比個summary更加大鑊
P. 2
With these caveats in mind, our work suggests that a basic reproductive number for this 2019-nCoV outbreak is higher compared to other emergent coronaviruses, suggesting that containment or control of this pathogen may be substantially more difficult. 比SARS同MERS更加難隔離同控制，當支那仲話可防可控嘅時候，我就一定係信外國專家

P. 3
top destinations being Shanghai (53,214 bookings), Beijing (51,066 bookings) and Kunming (40,120 bookings)
武漢嘅民航最多人飛嘅目的地就係北京 上海同昆明，呢三個城市

We only considered human-to- human transmission in our model, and made the assumption that following the closure of the market, no further zoonotic infection contributed to the epidemic dynamics. 個研究假設個街市關閉之後再冇人經過動物染病，但係以支那人食野味嘅習性⋯

We assumed that the incubation period was 4 days 假設潛伏期係4日，即係如果實際潛伏期會影響預測嘅準確度

P. 4
We stress that these projections make strong assumptions: that no control interventions are instigated; that the key epidemiological variables driving epidemic dynamics remain constant; that travel behaviour within China and to the rest of the world continues as per our mobility estimates; finally, we only consider travel by air, and do not include land transportation, particularly via trains.
假設冇抗疫行動，假設病毒傳染嘅變數不變
同時冇考慮到陸路交通，即係估計單靠空路播毒都可以導致北京上海會出現500至1000病例 (page 9)，如果加埋陸路交通咁咪仲大鑊

P. 5
Additionally, the spatial component of our model is dependent upon only airline travel; the model does not include rail and road transportation, so we may underestimate local connectivity 武漢市內交通對病毒傳播嘅作用可能會被低估

Our modelling of Wuhan travel restrictions does not account for stochastic effects, and so may underestimate the potential effect of travel restrictions as a consequence. 但係同時亦冇考慮到封城鎖國嘅作用

A key uncertainty of this outbreak is when it started. ... Had the outbreak started much earlier, and both domestic and international infections occurred before January and in early January (while surveillance was ramping up), our estimates of the reproductive number would mostly decrease.
唔知實際上疫情幾時開始，所以個model用咗1月1 用第一日，如果疫情早過1月1 開始，個reproductive number有機會下降
